argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | eftl.1 | |- F = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( A ^ n ) / ( ! ` n ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_efcllem | |- ( A e. CC -> seq 0 ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) -> seq 0 ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nn0uz | |- NN0 = ( ZZ>= ` 0 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) -> M e. NN0 ) |
| 6 | 1 | #P_eftval | |- ( k e. NN0 -> ( F ` k ) = ( ( A ^ k ) / ( ! ` k ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( F ` k ) = ( ( A ^ k ) / ( ! ` k ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eftcl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( ( A ^ k ) / ( ! ` k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantlr | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( ( A ^ k ) / ( ! ` k ) ) e. CC ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) /\ k e. NN0 ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 4, 5, 10 | #P_iserex | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) -> ( seq 0 ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> <-> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) ) |
| 12 | 3, 11 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ M e. NN0 ) -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
